isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - Meritor Medium Duty Front Drive Steer Axle - Assembly and Installation

warning.para: To prevent serious eye injury, always wear safe eye protection when you perform vehicle maintenance or service.

svcproc.title: Prepare Axle Housing

step1.para: If required, install a new outer grease seal and bushing in the spindle.
If required, install a new inner axle shaft bushing and oil seal in the housing (Figure 36). Use a correct size sleeve or driver. Apply a layer of Loctite 680 on the outside diameter of the bushing.

figure.caption: Figure 36. Install New Inner Axle Shaft Bushing and Oil Seal

caution.para: Do not force or hit the seal after it is correctly installed in its seat. The seal retainer can be damaged.

svcproc.para: If the socket plugs were removed from the housing, use the following procedures to re-install them:

step1.para: Position the socket plugs in the housings up against the counter bore.
Strike the domed socket plugs with a hammer to flatten and seat the plugs.
Drive new bushings into the socket bores so that the bushings are level with the outside of the socket. Use correct size sleeve or driver.
Pack the bushing with grease before assembly.
